Question ID 636 – Definition of types of removals
Release date
July 2024
Question asked
What are, or where can I find, the definitions of ‘biogenic removal and storage’, ‘removal and
storage from land use’, ‘technological removal and storage’ and ‘hybrid removal and storage’?
ESRS reference
ESRS E1 paragraph AR 58
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 149 of 278
